noti.post_created: {{if .PostTitle}}{{.TaggerName}} has created a post '{{.PostTitle}}'.{{else if .PostImage}}{{.TaggerName}} has created an image post.{{end}}
noti.react_post: {{if .PostTitle}}{{.TaggerName}} has reacted to your post '{{.PostTitle}}'.{{else if .PostImage}}{{.TaggerName}} has reacted to your image post.{{end}}
noti.tag_user: {{if .PostTitle}}{{.TaggerName}} has tagged you in the post '{{.PostTitle}}'.{{else if .PostImage}}{{.TaggerName}} has tagged you in this image post.{{end}}
noti.tag_comment: {{if .PostTitle}}{{.TaggerName}} has mentioned you in the post '{{.PostTitle}}'.{{else if .PostImage}}{{.TaggerName}} has mentioned you in this image post.{{end}}
